attributes.action: End the rights of foriegn criminals and terrorists to stay in this country
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to overturn the ridiculous huiman rights laws that allows foriegn criminals and terrorists to remain in this country at our expense. We the tax paying public have enough of a burden on us with the current financial climate without keeping people who contribute absolutely nothing to our society. It is about time the government got tough with the courts and these illegals and sent them from where they came.
